subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Auctions
lead_paragraph: Long after the current Yankee Stadium turns to rubble, the gray linen-cloth blueprints for the baseball landmark will serve as the bridge from past to present.
snippet: Long after the current Yankee Stadium turns to rubble, the gray linen-cloth blueprints for the baseball landmark will serve as the bridge from past to present.
